TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi PrintSystemJobInfo extends System.Printing.PrintSystemObject

summary.span: 详细定义打印作业。

span.span: Defines a print job in detail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类有没有公共构造函数。This class has no public constructor. 若要获取对的引用对象，请使用静态方法或下列任一实例方法： ， ，或。To get a reference to a object, use the static method or one of the following instance methods: , , or . 多个打印作业属性，如是否完成作业后，必须从的打印机的传递对象，然后应用程序读取相应的属性 ()。Many print job properties, such as whether a job is completed, must be passed from the printer to the object before your application reads the corresponding property (). 方法提供了此功能。The method provides this functionality. 同样，当你的应用程序的值更改属性，必须将更改写入的打印队列实用工具的计算机上。Similarly, when your application changes the value of the property, the change must be written to the print queue utility on the computer. 方法提供了此功能。The method provides this functionality. 如果派生的类从具有其他可写属性，则必须实现的重写和方法。If you derive a class from that has additional writable properties, then you must implement an override of the and methods. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用在这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

span.span: Cancels the print job.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

summary.span: 将 对象属性的任何更改写入该对象所代表的实际打印作业中。

span.span: Writes any changes to the properties of the object to the actual print job that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅属性是可写。Only the property is writable. 如果派生的类从具有其他可写属性，必须重写和方法使用你自己的实现。If you derive a class from that has additional writable properties, you must override the and methods with implementations of your own.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDeleted As Boolean
public: property bool IsDeleted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示打印作业（由 对象表示）是否已从打印队列中删除。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the print job, which is represented by the object, was deleted from the print queue.

value.span: 如果已删除打印作业，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the print job was deleted; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它可能看起来很矛盾在第一个对象可以报告其自己的状态为已删除，但请记住对象仅*表示*实际的打印作业。It may seem paradoxical at first that an object can report its own status as deleted, but keep in mind that the object only *represents* a real print job. 从其打印队列中删除打印并不会不会自动释放的在应用程序中的对象。Deleting the latter from its print queue does not automatically dispose of the object in your application. 同样，该对象不会从任何删除它所代表的打印作业之前创建。Similarly, the object is not removed from any that was created before the print job it represents was deleted. 例如，如果方法运行之前已删除打印作业时，返回的集合将包含对象，表示打印作业。For example, if the method is run before the print job was deleted, the returned collection will include a object that represents the print job. 删除打印作业时，此对象不从集合中删除。This object is not removed from the collection when the print job is deleted. 但是，如果然后再次运行，返回集合将会有任何成员表示已删除打印作业。But if is then run again, the returned collection will have no members that represent the deleted print jobs. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何诊断问题的打印作业时使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property when diagnosing a problem with a print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#SpotTroubleUsingJobProperties](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#spottroubleusingjobproperties)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#SpotTroubleUsingJobProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#spottroubleusingjobproperties)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#SpotTroubleUsingJobProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#spottroubleusingjobproperties)]

span.span: if the printer is printing; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新启动作业时，它将打印整个作业。When a job is restarted, it prints in its entirety. 重新启动与使用的对比度方法，后者将恢复点已暂停的作业。Contrast restarting with using the method, which resumes a job at the point it was paused.

value.span: 一个标识打印作业的 。

span.span: An that identifies the print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用哪种编号系统已确定的打印服务器和打印服务器是一台计算机或打印服务器设备的操作系统。Which numbering system is used is determined by the operating system of the print server and whether the print server is a computer or a print server appliance. 例如，适用于 Microsoft Windows XP 的操作系统决定以这种方式编号： 第一个服务器上由任何用户提交到任何队列的打印作业打印服务器打开时，如果所有打印队列为空，被分配 ID 号 2。For example, the operating system for Microsoft Windows XP determines the numbering in this way: when a print server is turned on, if all its print queues are empty, the first print job submitted on the server by any user and to any queue is assigned ID number 2. 在服务器上的每个后续作业分配一个数字大于该服务器上的上一个打印作业。Each subsequent job on the server is assigned a number that is one greater than the previous print job on that server. 打印作业的打印队列没有任何影响它的数字： 如果作业发送到队列 a，队列 b 和 QueueA，按该顺序，则队列 a 将拥有 2 和 4，作业和队列 b 将拥有作业 3。The print queue for the print job has no effect on its number: if jobs are sent to QueueA, QueueB, and QueueA, in that order, then QueueA has jobs 2 and 4, and QueueB has job 3. 作业分配一个数字之后，数永远不会更改，即使其他作业完成打印，或被取消或重新启动服务器。After a job is assigned a number, the number never changes, even if other jobs finish printing or are canceled, or if the server is restarted. 如果已作业队列中有一个或多个服务器重新启动时，第一个新的作业分配一个数字，是一个大于最大作业编号，在服务器启动时处于队列中。If there are already jobs in one or more queues when the server is restarted, the first new job is assigned a number that is one greater than the highest numbered job that was in the queue when the server started. 但是，直到它重新启动，打印服务器不会重复使用一个数字。However, until it restarts, a print server does not reuse a number. 即使在打印之前，最高编号的作业已取消下, 一步作业获取一个数字，是一个更高版本。Even if the highest numbered job is canceled before it is printed, the next job gets a number that is one higher. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何诊断问题的打印作业时使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property when diagnosing a problem with a print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#EnumerateJobsInQueues](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#enumeratejobsinqueues)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#EnumerateJobsInQueues](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#enumeratejobsinqueues)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#EnumerateJobsInQueues](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#enumeratejobsinqueues)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 Windows 8 和更高版本的操作系统上的.NET Framework 4.5 开始，写入此流的数据必须采用 XPS 格式作为包流。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5 on Windows 8 and later versions of the operating system, data written to this stream must be in XPS format as a package stream.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NumberOfPages As Integer
public: property int NumberOfPages { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取打印作业中的页数。

span.span: Gets the number of pages in the print job.

value.span: 一个 ，它指示打印作业的页数。

span.span: An that states the number of pages in the print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一页是一张纸的纸张或其他打印介质的一侧。A page is one side of a sheet of paper or other print media. 下表显示了此属性，并使用的表数的值影响打印作业是否为双面打印 （双面打印） 调用、 它是否为多个页面-每版，调用或它是否同时调用。The following table shows how the value of this property, and the number of sheets used, is affected by whether the print job calls for two-sided printing (duplexing), whether it calls for multiple pages-per-sheet, or whether it calls for both. ### 双面打印设置和多页打印如何影响打印How duplexing and multipage printing affect printing |双面打印Duplexing|每张纸打印的页Pages per sheet|页数的值Value of NumberOfPages|纸张的物理表数Number of physical sheets of paper| |---------------|---------------------|----------------------------|----------------------------------------| |否No|11|相同的文档中的页数。Identical to the number of pages in the document.|相同的文档中的页数。Identical to the number of pages in the document.| |是Yes|11|相同的文档中的页数。Identical to the number of pages in the document.|文档页 ÷ 2 （向上舍入）。Document pages ÷ 2 (rounded up).| |否No|多页Multiple|文档页面 ÷ 页面每张纸打印 （向上舍入）。Document pages ÷ Pages per sheet (rounded up).|文档页面 ÷ 页面每张纸打印 （向上舍入）。Document pages ÷ Pages per sheet (rounded up).| |是Yes|多页Multiple|文档页面 ÷ 页面每张纸打印 （向上舍入）。Document pages ÷ Pages per sheet (rounded up).|[文档页 ÷ 每张纸打印的页面] ÷ 2 （向上舍入）。[Document pages ÷ Pages per sheet] ÷ 2 (rounded up).|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pause() cil managed

summary.span: 暂停打印作业，直到 运行。

span.span: Halts printing of the job until runs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果队列中有另一个作业，它将暂停当前作业时开始打印。If another job is in the queue, it begins printing when the current job is paused. 承载还有和方法。The hosting also has and methods. 如果打印队列已暂停，继续单个作业不会导致以继续打印该作业。If the print queue is paused, resuming an individual job does not cause that job to resume printing.

value.span: 一个 ，表示打印作业的优先级，如 、、 或 。

span.span: A that represents the priority of the print job as , , , or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 更新 对象的属性，以便它们的值与该对象所代表的实际打印作业的值相匹配。

span.span: Updates the properties of the object so that their values match the values of the actual print job that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的属性所做的任何更改对象必须通过使用写入到的实际打印作业方法。Any changes that you make to the properties of a object must be written to the actual print job by using the method. 你尚未提交任何更改会丢失时方法运行。Any changes that you have not committed are lost when the method runs. 如果派生的类从具有其他属性，则必须重写与你自己的实现方法。If you derive a class from that has additional properties, then you must override the method with an implementation of your own.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Restart() cil managed

summary.span: 从头开始重新启动打印作业。

span.span: Restarts a print job from the beginning.

remarks.format: ## Remarks （可选） 可以使用方法，后者将重新启动暂停的打印作业，从已暂停的点开始。Optionally, you can use the method, which restarts a paused print job, starting at the point it was paused.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Resume() cil managed

summary.span: 继续打印暂停的打印作业。

span.span: Resumes the printing of a paused print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 承载还有和方法。The hosting also has and methods. 如果打印队列已暂停，继续单个作业不会继续打印打印作业。If the print queue is paused, resuming an individual job does not resume the printing of the print job. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法来恢复暂停的打印作业。The following example shows how to use this method to resume a paused print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#HandlePausedJob](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#handlepausedjob)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#HandlePausedJob](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#handlepausedjob)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#HandlePausedJob](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#handlepausedjob)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StartTimeOfDay As Integer
public: property int StartTimeOfDay { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取一天中打印作业可以开始打印的最早时间，用协调世界时 (UTC)（也称为格林尼治标准时间 [GMT]）午夜过后的分钟数表示。

span.span: Gets the earliest time of day, expressed as the number of minutes after midnight Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) (also called Greenwich Mean Time [GMT]), that the print job can begin printing.

value.span: 一个 ，指定打印作业可能的最早开始时间，用 (UTC) 午夜过后的分钟数表示。

span.span: An specifying the earliest possible start time for the print job, expressed as the number of minutes after midnight (UTC).

value.span: 最大值为 1439。

span.span: The maximum value is 1439.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值会传播到每个对象从的托管属性时，作业将进入队列。This value is propagated to each object from the property of the hosting at the time the job enters the queue. 如果发生更改，那么任何值早于更改为的值。If is changed, then any value that is earlier than is changed to the value of . 该作业已添加到队列后，它可以提供一个新值通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，前提是不早于。After the job is added to the queue, it can be given a new value through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], provided that it is not earlier than . 如果你不在 UTC 时区，必须添加或减去 60 以获得有关你所在的时区正确的时间的倍数。If you are not in the UTC time zone, you must add or subtract multiples of 60 to get the correct time for your time zone. 例如，如果您处于北美太平洋时区的并且夏时制不起作用，则您的本地时间是比 UTC 早 8 小时。For example, if you are in the Pacific Time Zone of North America and daylight savings time is not in effect, then your local time is 8 hours earlier than UTC. 如果返回 960，这意味着 16:00 （下午 4:00） 以 UTC (因为 960/60 = 16)。If returns 960, that means 16:00 (4:00 PM) in UTC (because 960/60 = 16). 若要将其转换为太平洋时间，您必须减去 （= 8 \* 60） 480 分钟。To convert this to Pacific Time, you must subtract 480 (= 8 \* 60) minutes. 您还必须记住的时间升级到零后 24 小时 (即; 1439 分后)。You also must remember that time rolls over to zero after 24 hours (that is; after the 1439th minute). 如果返回 120，这意味着凌晨 2:00 utc 格式。If returns 120, that means 2:00 AM in UTC. 若要将其转换为太平洋时间，必须减去 480 分钟，这会导致-360。To convert this to Pacific Time, you must subtract 480 minutes, which results in -360. 若要获取有意义的正值，请将负号添加到一天，1440，得出 1080 （下午 6:00） 太平洋时间的最终值中的总分钟数。To get a positive value that has meaning, add the negative number to the total minutes in a day, 1440, resulting in a final value of 1080 (6:00 PM) Pacific Time. 请参阅， ，和帮助进行时区调整的方法。See , , and for methods that help make time-zone adjustments. 如果打印机始终可用，此属性对在所有时区返回 0。If the printer is always available, then this property returns 0 in all time zones. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性作为诊断有问题的打印作业的过程的一部分。The following example shows how to use this property as part of the process of diagnosing a problematic print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值会传播到每个对象从的托管属性时，作业将进入队列。This value is propagated to each object from the property of the hosting at the time the job enters the queue. 如果发生更改，那么任何值晚于更改为的值。If is changed, then any value that is later than is changed to the value of . 该作业已添加到队列后，它可以提供一个新值通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，前提是不晚于。After the job is added to the queue, it can be given a new value through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], provided that it is not later than . 如果你不在 UTC 时区，必须添加或减去 60 以获得有关你所在的时区正确的时间的倍数。If you are not in the UTC time zone, you must add or subtract multiples of 60 to get the correct time for your time zone. 例如，如果您处于北美太平洋时区的并且夏时制不起作用，则您的本地时间是比 UTC 早 8 小时。For example, if you are in the Pacific Time Zone of North America and daylight savings time is not in effect, then your local time is 8 hours earlier than UTC. 如果返回 960，这意味着 16:00 （下午 4:00） 以 UTC (因为 960/60 = 16)。If returns 960, that means 16:00 (4:00 PM) in UTC (because 960/60 = 16). 若要将其转换为太平洋时间，您必须减去 （= 8 \* 60） 480 分钟。To convert this to Pacific Time, you must subtract 480 (= 8 \* 60) minutes. 您还必须记住的时间升级到零后 24 小时 (即; 1439 分后)。You also must remember that time rolls over to zero after 24 hours (that is; after the 1439th minute). 如果返回 120，这意味着凌晨 2:00 utc 格式。If returns 120, that means 2:00 AM in UTC. 若要将其转换为太平洋时间，必须减去 480 分钟，这会导致-360。To convert this to Pacific Time, you must subtract 480 minutes, which results in -360. 若要获取有意义的正值，请将负号添加到一天，1440，得出 1080 （下午 6:00） 太平洋时间的最终值中的总分钟数。To get a positive value that has meaning, add the negative number to the total minutes in a day, 1440, resulting in a final value of 1080 (6:00 PM) Pacific Time. 请参阅， ，和帮助进行时区调整的方法。See , , and for methods that help make time-zone adjustments. 如果打印机始终可用，此属性对在所有时区返回 0。If the printer is always available, then this property returns 0 in all time zones. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性作为诊断有问题的打印作业的过程的一部分。The following example shows how to use this property as part of the process of diagnosing a problematic print job.
